title: Stranded on a Deserted Island, What to Do? - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo Ai   Yuri
tags: Aristocracy   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Loyal Subordinates   Pregnancy   Strong Love Interests   Survival   Tsundere
author: 柳碎夜
description:
The arrogant and poisonous Duke’s daughter and the silent bodyguard both feel the difficult, embarrasing and shameful way of survival after being stranded on a deserted island.

Hua Mu, a Guide who has no power to restrain the chicken, could only rely on the silent Sentinel Bai Zhen’s ability to survive.>
